title: Discovering the forest
subject_group: Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Natural history
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Forest ecology
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Education of children
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Observation (Psychology)
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Education of children
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Education of children
description: Presents the story of the forest community; discussing its conditions, forms of life and inter-relationships. The mood of the forest is established through its own atmosphere, sounds and life - there is no narration. Designed to encourage children to observe, and then interpret their observations.
